bot.welcome:
👋 Welcome to FAB - Firewall Access Bot!

🔒 This bot helps you manage firewall access.

What would you like to do?
bot.access_link_created:
✅ Access link created!

🔗 Click the link to configure access:
{link}

⏱ Link expires in 1 hour.
bot.excluded_ips_note: ℹ️ Note: For networks/addresses [{ips}] access is always open and doesn't require setup. Messages for these addresses are not sent to external systems.
bot.no_active_accesses:
📝 No active accesses found.

You don't have any open firewall accesses at the moment.
bot.access_not_found: ❌ Access not found or already closed.
bot.unauthorized:
🚫 Access denied!

Your user ID ({user_id}) is not authorized to use this bot.

Please contact the administrator to request access.
bot.admin_menu:
👥 **User Management**

As an administrator, you can manage the whitelist of authorized users.
bot.add_user_prompt:
📝 **Add User to Whitelist**

Send me the Telegram user ID of the person you want to authorize.

You can get their ID by asking them to send /start to @userinfobot
bot.no_users_in_whitelist:
📝 No users in whitelist yet.

Add users to allow them to use the bot.
bot.name: Name
bot.user_removed: ✅ User {user_id} has been removed from whitelist.
bot.user_added_to_whitelist: ✅ User {user_id} has been added to whitelist.
bot.use_commands:
🤖 Use commands or buttons to interact with the bot.
Send /start to open the main menu.
bot.help_text:
🔒 **FAB - Firewall Access Bot Help**

**Available commands:**
• Add Access - Create a new access link
• My Accesses - View and manage active accesses
• Help - Show this help message

**How it works:**
1. Click 'Add Access' to generate a link
2. Open the link to configure access duration
3. Monitor and close accesses when needed

**Need support?** Contact the administrator.

messages.confirm_close: Are you sure you want to close access?
messages.always_open: ℹ️ For your network, access is always open on FAB side; no setup required.
